title: "Older teen" shot on Jacksonville's west side
content:
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. -- The Jacksonville Sheriff's Office reported to the scene of an aggravated battery where a teen was shot on the 900 block of West Palm Ave.
According to police, the incident occurred at around 11:40 a.m. on the Westside. Authorities believe that it may have been a shoot out and are looking for an "white older-style police car" in connection with the shooting.
The teen was taken to UF Health and is still alive, according to police, however they do not have an exact update on his condition.
